abstract: Wyeth has scheduled a meeting for its shareholders to vote on whether to approve its pending acquisition by Pfizer.
snippet: Wyeth has scheduled a meeting for its shareholders to vote on whether to approve its pending acquisition by Pfizer.
lead_paragraph: The drug maker Wyeth has scheduled a meeting for its shareholders to vote on whether to approve the company’s pending acquisition by Pfizer, The Associated Press said.

headline.main: Wyeth Sets Meeting for Shareholders’ Merger Vote
